info.title: Payment service
info.description: API for payment processing, enabling merchants to initiate and manage payment transactions.

servers.description: Base URL for the Payment Service API

get.summary: Retrieve details of a specific transaction
get.description: This endpoint retrieves detailed information about a specific transaction using its unique ID. The transaction details include the payment status, amount, currency, and other metadata.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the transaction to retrieve.

parameters.name: X-Userinfo-Merchant-Id
parameters.description: ID of the merchant performing the request. This is a UUID.

parameters.name: X-Userinfo-Customer-Id
parameters.description: ID of the customer performing the request. Optional if the merchant is acting on behalf of a customer.

200.description: The transaction details corresponding to the provided ID.

default.description: An error occurred while retrieving the transaction details.

TransactionResponse.description: Details of a transaction, including its status and metadata.

id.description: The unique identifier of the transaction.

external_id.description: The external identifier of the transaction, if applicable.

payment_provider.description: The ID of the payment provider handling the transaction.

payer_wallet.description: The wallet ID of the payer initiating the payment.

amount.description: The transaction amount in the smallest unit of the specified currency (e.g., cents for USD).

currency.description: ISO 4217 currency code representing the currency of the transaction (e.g., USD, EUR).

status.description: The current status of the transaction.

ErrorResponse.description: Error response returned when an operation fails.

error.description: A description of the error that occurred.
